modName: Remodeled Armors with Lorecraft and on NPC
summary: Added support for Lorecraft and assigned Remodeled Armor\'s to Leveledlists(NPC)
descriptionHtml:
Name: Remodeled Armors with Lorecraft and on NPC
Authors: hexenhaus

----------------------------------------

Credits:

- ALL credits for the great \"Remodeled Armor\" mod goes to MAK07
- Thank\'s to ArcaneSmith for his innovative \"Lorecraft - acquire learn manage crafting recipes\" and for making the Lorecraft-Tut ;)
- Big thanks to Caliente for creating 	Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- & Bodyslide

----------------------------------------

I dont like my crafting menue overcrowded, but i like the Lorecraft-concept of finding recipes and toggle books for activation of recipes. As well i wanted random NPC\'s to wear the mod\'s armors. So i created Lorecraft-books for each armor type of Remodeled armor and added the armors to, i hope almost all lvledlists. 

This is NO Armor-replacer, as i added the armours to their respectively  lists and sets. For example a thalmor can wear the normal \"ArmorElvenLightCuirass\" as well as the \"000ArmorElvenLightCuirass\"(Remodeled Armor-mesh).

The idea behind the mod was, beside of purging the crafting list, to add more diversity to the armors. As MAK07 provided us with a \"substitution with vanilla armors\".esp, i wanted to keep KillerKeo\'s Skimpy Armors, so i decided to make both mods (vanilla or vanilla replacer and Remodeled Armors) equal.

The chance for npc`s to wear Remodeled armors is minor to vanilla armors, as the lists contain sometimes  several of the same armors and i added only one remodeled to any lists. But as there are lists for rare/high items the chance for finding highlvl items, like glass, dragonbone or ebony armors is slightly increased.

If you find more bugs or you like the idea of my mod please leave comments or endorse me, so that i am motivated for some bugfixing or adding of new ideas =) 
Atm i think about adding BBP-support to Remodeled Armors... hmm

----------------------------------------

Crafting:

All Armors are craftable with the corresponding recipe-books and the appropriate skills at any forge

----------------------------------------

Requirements:

- Lorecraft - acquire learn manage crafting recipes by ArcaneSmith (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9959)
- Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004)
- Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666)

----------------------------------------

Installation:

1. Use NMM
2. deactivate original \"Remodeled Armor.esp\"
3. activate my \"Remodeled Armor with Lorecraft and on NPC.esp\"
----------------------------------------

Known bugs:

-few armors are missing in lvllists (can\'t find Dark Brotherhood armor O_o)
-some guards have both armors in their backpacks
-(...)

----------------------------------------

Tools used:

Creation Kit

----------------------------------------

Version 1.1: added missing Forsworn Armor - Recipe, fixed the recipe prices (can be found now) 

[Version 1.0: Functional version]
